NEW <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]> More Bang For Your Buck
That's right. Sign up for Business Select and get an extra 15% OFF** your next purchase. Sign Up & Save <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/account/SimplifiedPublicAccountSignUp1?cmp=EBBSPRELOGIN193EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]>
Plus, every time you shop you’ll enjoy exclusive membership upgrades including: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/account/SimplifiedPublicAccountSignUp1?cmp=EBBSPRELOGIN193EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3?]]> UP TO 20% OFF office products, furniture, and cleaning & breakroom supplies <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/account/SimplifiedPublicAccountSignUp1?cmp=EBBSPRELOGIN193EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3?]]> UP TO 49% OFF paper <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/account/SimplifiedPublicAccountSignUp1?cmp=EBBSPRELOGIN193EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3?]]> UP TO 25% OFF ink & toner Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3&utm_content=Pre+Login+Email+Journey+3]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
** Promo code will become available via email once account sign up is completed. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Minimum purchase of $75 is required to receive the 15% off. Not valid on bottled water, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢.
